title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 281.3 - Representation of parties
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 281.3 - Representation of parties

State Regulations

The appellant may appear before the commissioner personally
or by an attorney. The community school district superintendent or the

Chancellor of the City School District of the City of New York (hereinafter
"chancellor") may appear only by an attorney. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
281.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
